dimensions: Warp: 210 cm (82 3/4 in.). Weft: 135 cm (53 1/2 in.). 2 pieces sewn together.
title: Le char de l'aurore (The Chariot of Dawn)
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved plate on plain weave
description: Series of scenes of the gods and goddesses inspired by Guidi Reni's (1575-1642) design in the Palais Pallavicini in Rome and the sculpture at the Basin of Apollo.
name: Textile
